long_description: Osprey sets a new standard of weight and performance with the Ozone 22 wheeled luggage. They've channeled years of experience building lightweight packs and luggage into this fresh design. With a minimalist but robust body and a lighter, redesigned chassis, this full-featured package offers excellent roll, rugged performance and multiple organizational features. New HighRoad LT(TM) chassis is light, strong and smooth rolling; it shaves almost 20% off the weight of the original HighRoad chassis. HighRoad LT premium suspension features a 6001 aluminum frame, highly durable, injection-molded, high-clearance ABS base and large polyurethane wheels with sealed bearings. Extendable handle is ergonomically designed for comfortable gripping. Lightweight construction and fabrics feature strategic reinforcements at key wear areas. 3 external compression straps secure load and protect zippers. External zip top pocket is ideal for toiletries, liquids and frequently needed items. 2 full-length external zip pockets on front panel. Rear panel pocket with inner zip pocket keeps magazines and small items handy. Internal compression straps keep gear and clothing neat and secure. 3 large internal zip pockets keep gear organized. Low-profile, padded top and side handles provide comfortable carry for the Osprey Ozone 22. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: Osprey sets a new standard of weight and performance with the Ozone 22 wheeled luggage. They've channeled years of experience building lightweight packs and luggage into this fresh design.
